previewArticle.title: New England Revolution vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 1, Chivas USA 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA and New England are underway at Gillette Stadium.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New England Revolution vs. Chivas USA

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Offside, New England Revolution. Diego Fagundez tries a through ball, but Charlie Davies is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: Quiet start to the game #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Charlie showing that he still has some speed #NEREVS

timelineItems.comment: Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: I understand wanting to reestablish the Nguyen-Daigo connection & wanting to keep Rowe in lineup, but dunno if he's a winger #NERevs #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 10' #ChivasUSA looking to open the scoreboard but it's the #NERevs that are keeping Kennedy busy

timelineItems.comment: José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: W. Knutt Megg Esq.
timelineItems.text: I've heard the winning coach of #NEvCHV gets to arm wrestle Frank Yallop for the rights to Jermaine Jones.

timelineItems.desc: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Erick Torres sweeps Lee Nguyen's leg

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Feels like Rowe is playing more centrally than Bunbury usually does. Am I wrong? #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #NERevs dominating possession 12 minutes into the game, with 72% of the play. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Now Kobayashi has moved wide. Looks like the attacking midfield trio will be allowed some freedom #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: Prairie Rose Clayton
timelineItems.text: "Even our owner is better than yours." Is Dallas in town? 'Cause that was a BURN #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Nifty little trick with the new @GilletteStadium signs. Lit them up yellow for the yellow card. Nice touch there #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Felix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth reacts quickly to the Felix Borja strike

timelineItems.name: Mike Roncevic
timelineItems.text: My second home @nerevolution #nerevs #gillettestadium @rh0dy19

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eric Avila with a headed pass.
Foul by Akira Kaji (Chivas USA).
Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Jessie Coffield
timelineItems.text: Revs looking real sharp tonight, hungry for that W #NERevs #NEvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Lee Nguyen cracks a shot over the bar

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Big save by Bobby Shuttleworth. Thought last game was one of his best in recent memory #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Borja showing what he brings. Physicality. Precision. Great save by Shuttleworth to keep it even. #nevchv

timelineItems.name: cjmcalpine
timelineItems.text: Love our view! @nerevolution #NEvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Diego Fagundez.
Match ends, New England Revolution 1, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #NERevs edge @cdchivasusa 1-0 and remain well in the East's playoff picture. http://t.co/yuS6ieJIMR #NEvCHV http://t.co/OWsFrkD8Pe

timelineItems.desc: Two clubs looking for victories to pull themselves back into the playoff places meet in an interconference matchup as the New England Revolution play host to Chivas USA at Gillette Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New England Revolution vs. Chivas USA | August 23, 2014

timelineItems.name: Will Northrup
timelineItems.text: Don't mind that shot. After all that work Nguyen deserved it. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.

timelineItems.name: Prairie Rose Clayton
timelineItems.text: Dudes behind me are cheering alternately for Cubo and Mr. T #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: #nerevs lets GO!!!!!!!!!!

timelineItems.name: Matt Fedorka
timelineItems.text: #NERevs #MLS #soccer http://t.co/VL11Ytjzvq

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Rowe gets stripped of the ball in the 21st minute. Memories of last week's Ridgewell goal come to mind #NEREVS

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Erick Torres (Chivas USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 22'- Corner is cleared and then swung back to Rowe on the right flank. He crosses low but no Revs in the box to connect with it. #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Steven Erickson
timelineItems.text: Rowe is having a bad game so far. #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Fake JP Dellacamera
timelineItems.text: Battle of cardigan coaching sweaters in this Revs/Chivas match.#NERevs #NEvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: #NERevs getting fair share of chances early on, but final ball and finishing remain issues thus far.

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: Game is totally lacking in flow right now. Seems like a silly mistake will decide this one. #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: So far, #NEvCHV is a classic MLS game of lower half teams running a lot and accomplishing little.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 27'- Chivas midfielder Eric Avila is limping and seems to be in pain. He may be coming off soon. #NEvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Eric Avila.

timelineItems.name: Carissa harris
timelineItems.text: #NERevs #nerevsselfie http://t.co/JEWQBm5Siv

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Good early chance for the Revs. Nguyen lobs one over the top for Davies but he can't get a solid foot on it. Still scoreless 3rd min #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Bianca Sings Sperduti
timelineItems.text: Thank you @2fast2farrell for giving me your warm up jersey 😘 Good luck! #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Scott Caldwell tries a through ball, but Charlie Davies is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Maggie Streng
timelineItems.text: Nothin like walking on the field of the pros and being on live tv #imfamous #NERevs #NERevsgame #goNERevs http://t.co/liwCwXla0P

timelineItems.name: Topher
timelineItems.text: Referee for the #NEvCHV game is hilarious "CHARLIE YOURE GONNA GET A FOUL!" #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: No one uses the outside of their foot quite like Daigo Kobayashi. Clever stuff #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Move evidence of switching: Diego moves right right and Rowe on the left #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Akira Kaji tries a through ball, but Erick Torres is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Craig Forde
timelineItems.text: The trio of Soares, Goncalves and Shuttlesworth are really padding their passing stats tonight #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Lee Nguyen pounds a shot into the side netting

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Fact: the Fort is emptying. #nerevs @NErebellion @MidnightRiders http://t.co/BE1fFrrcsc

timelineItems.comment: Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Diego Fagundez.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: John Heavey
timelineItems.text: Why is like half the fort sitting down? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: kelsey ahmed
timelineItems.text: What's going on why is the fort leaving ? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: BENJADED #NEREVS FAN
timelineItems.text: Nguyen could’ve pretty easily gone down there. Integrity. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: birdboy2000
timelineItems.text: Rowe has not impressed on set pieces tonight. Tierney we miss you. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Max Fischer
timelineItems.text: Can't remember seeing a less-threatening team in possession. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: From the press box, it appears that half the fort has left. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Eric Avila.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: That's a classic Charlie Davies run #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 3' #NERevs 0 Chivas USA 0 Deft little chip from @LeeNguyen24 almost puts @CharlieDavies9 in on Kennedy, but it's just out of his reach.

timelineItems.comment: Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the center of the box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Erick Torres skips a shot wide

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Nathan Sturgis.
Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 41'- Erick Torres gets off a shot while being guarded dancing around 3 Revs, but it rolls across the face of goal and out wide #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Heather O'Neill
timelineItems.text: The #NERevs FO claims they want a "European atmosphere" & then they kick out half of the supporters for chanting what they don't approve of.

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Félix Borja (Chivas USA).
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.
Attempt blocked. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Smart run by Davies to open up space for Rowe, unfortunately his shot is blocked #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 43'- Davies has the ball in the box and can't get a shot off. Finds Rowe who crosses, but deflected out for a corner #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chivas has given up six corners, but Revs haven't done much with any of them. Call it a draw. #nevchv

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Andrew Farrell.
Attempt missed. Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: LRT: Sounds like a large number of #NERevs supporters were just kicked out of Gillette.

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: #NERevs with 70% possession on first half but only one shot on goal. Have to be more creative in final third here

timelineItems.name: Matt Bloom
timelineItems.text: The Fort has walked out due to security kicking out a few Rebellion supporters for foul language #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, New England Revolution 0, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Cameron Ramos
timelineItems.text: I dare you to find a more boring half if soccer for me to watch #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Thats the half. Still scoreless at the half and the Revs held 67.8% of possession. The final touch is missing but chances are there #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Andy P
timelineItems.text: BREAKING: #nerevs have traded the Fort for more tarps and an undisclosed amount of allocation money.

timelineItems.name: Mike Marshall
timelineItems.text: And 90% of this could be stopped if the #NERevs would just set up a "Family Section" away from The Fort.

timelineItems.name: AO Hartford
timelineItems.text: As a form of protest, our chapter prez walked out of The Fort tonight #nerevs #supportthefort

timelineItems.name: Andrew Yee
timelineItems.text: Rowe needs to stop taking corners. #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Dan Remmes
timelineItems.text: Why would an organization that struggles for true supporters alienate the ones they have? #NERevs @NERevolution @NErebellion

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins New England Revolution 0, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Brady Young
timelineItems.text: Lets go revs! #nerevs @nerevolution

timelineItems.desc: A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: A.J. Soares takes down Erick Torres

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: High Rant District
timelineItems.text: Deft move by @NERevolution to deflect attention from their crappy play by tossing supporters for language. #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 48' #NERevs 0 Chivas USA 0 Yellow issued to @AjSoares after taking down Torres. Ref appeared to indicate it's for persistent infingement.

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #NEvCHV Wow, Goats, 11 men behind the ball right from the start?

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: This is a Chivas lineup that can win the possession battle. Team is really pressing early. Borja looks like he's settling in nicely #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: JT Chang
timelineItems.text: 4 fouls committed so far by the revs. All of them by Soares.... #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Agustin Pelletieri (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Agustin Pelletieri weaves and pumps a shot at Shuttleworth

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 50'-Chivas with a great chance as Agustin Pelletieri finds space in the box. Shoots low & Shuttleworth makes his second save tonight #NEvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: JaviER
timelineItems.text: Rosales will come on the second half for #ChivasUSA and will make a difference! He should be a starter!! Oh wait.....😭😭😭😭

timelineItems.desc: Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Tony Lochhead  slides through Charlie Davies

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Davies down on the field and they're calling for the athletic trainers. Took a shot to his ankle and rolled it #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) because of an injury.
Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) left footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Daigo Kobayashi curls a shot inches over the bar

timelineItems.name: BENJADED #NEREVS FAN
timelineItems.text: That could easily be red. Not malicious but dangerous, into ankle, from behind (?) #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Davies now up and walking off under his own power. Yellow issued to Lochhead on the play #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: With that yellow, Lochhead will miss SuperClasico for yellow card accumulation #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: So close by Diago. Just barely over the crossbar on that shot, Revs continue to create but need to get the finish #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) left footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Darrius Barnes following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: 16,427 is the announced attendance #NEREVS

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 1, Chivas USA 0. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Lee Nguyen smokes one by Dan Kennedy

timelineItems.name: 🌟🌟Jen Mullins🌟🌟
timelineItems.text: Revs game with my girl!! #NERevsselfie #NERevs #gillettestadium #soccer

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Great shot from Nguyen, nice hustle from Rowe and creative vision by Daigo #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: LEE FOR THE LEAD!! @LeeNguyen24 lets fly from 20 yards and Kennedy gets a touch, but can't keep it out! #NERevs lead 1-0 in the 57th min!

timelineItems.name: Greg Eaton
timelineItems.text: Just got to hold onto it now #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: That's @LeeNguyen24's team-leading ninth goal of the season. His previous career high was five (2012), so this is better. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Akira Kaji.
Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).
Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Jodi Johnson
timelineItems.text: After the #NERevs scored..... http://t.co/axXCPiH3zM

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Props to @MidnightRiders and @NErebellion -- the Fort sounds great tonight! #nerevs http://t.co/1eLrergg3Y

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Lower bowl at @GilletteStadium looks pretty healthy tonight for this #NERevs game. Makes sense. Nice night for a game #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Garrett Diemer
timelineItems.text: Lee Nguyen is to #NERevs as Obi wan was to Princess Leia #OnlyHope

timelineItems.comment: A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Félix Borja (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: #NEREVS are 5-1-1 when Nguyen scores this year

timelineItems.name: Matty Jollie
timelineItems.text: Best start to a second half the #NERevs have had in a LONG time. @BFeld67

timelineItems.name: Ashley Fessenden
timelineItems.text: What better way to spend my last Saturday at home than going to a game with my mom #NewEngland #Revolution vs #ChivasUSA #soccer #motherdaughter #bonding #gillettestadium #picstitch

timelineItems.name: MSP
timelineItems.text: Do or die #nerevs. 3 points or nothing!

timelineItems.name: veronica burke
timelineItems.text: wouldn't want to spend my last night in mass at any other place. let's go revs! #NERevs http://t.co/ylcODjL4Xa

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Chivas players out early on the field. Looks like theyre just taking in the great weather #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Andrew Muskatello
timelineItems.text: #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Robbie Bowen
timelineItems.text: Let's go #NERevs @NERevolution @MLS http://t.co/rygeP2SMYv

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - The last seven first halves of #MLS games between @cdchivasusa and @NERevolution have averaged 2 goals apiece. Loaded. #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: New England Revolution
timelineItems.text: Thank you to #NERevs Season Ticket Holder Matt Shiner for being tonight's Honorary Captain!

timelineItems.name: Andrew Muskatello
timelineItems.text: New England vs Chivas USA #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Chris Goodwin
timelineItems.text: And as a member of the Fort, some of us are way overly sensitive to the no swearing thing...but still, Team Ops handled it poorly #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Source from in The Fort says protest was over selective enforcement by security. Ejected a few over a chant by entire group #NERevs #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Beautiful solo defensive effort by Barnes right there. Great tackle and a clean take away #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by A.J. Soares.

timelineItems.name: DC Revs Fan
timelineItems.text: Iffy cross there, but Davies looking very good tonight. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: BENJADED #NEREVS FAN
timelineItems.text: Teal wide open at the top of the box there. Take the shot or give it to someone Charlie. But great opp created. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Felix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Felix Borja  strikes an open look at goal

timelineItems.name: Evan Whitney
timelineItems.text: @GlancingHdr Many reasons #NERevs games sound subdued: cavernous stadium, fan demographics, limited organized support... its complicated.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Oswaldo Minda with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Camille
timelineItems.text: We're now entering the #nerevs "give up a goal danger zone" sponsored by Home Depot: your tarp HQ #TarpDerby

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Shuttleworth makes another good save, now on Borja again. Bobby having a strong night in goal #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Heather O'Neill
timelineItems.text: Fort update: we're back standing and singing...it's still sparse in some areas. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Oswaldo Minda takes down Farrell

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Marco Delgado tries a through ball, but Erick Torres is caught offside.
Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 70' #NERevs 1 Chivas USA 0 Yellow card issued to Oswaldo Minda after coming in high and hard on @2Fast2Farrell.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Bunbury gets little too fancy and turns ball over and Nguyen shows outward emotion in displeasure. Not often you see that from Lee #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the center of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Shuttleworth dives to poke away Erick Torres' header

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Nathan Sturgis with a cross.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Another awesome save by Shuttleworth. Diving with one hand to knock that away at the last moment #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 72' #NERevs 1 Chivas USA 0 Bobby! Stunning stop from @b_shuttle, who reached back to pull a goal-bound header off the line. Revs still lead.

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: #Chivas looking pretty hopeless, disjointed in the build up. #NERevs #Chivas #NEvCHV

timelineItems.name: rob c
timelineItems.text: these are the subs steve nicol would make, heaps, except he had a defense that could hold a a 1-0 lead. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Why not bring out Taylor? his speed could be really effective. #NERevs #Chivas #NEvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Steve Neumann (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Leandro Barrera tries a through ball, but Erick Torres is caught offside.

Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Neumann has showed that long shots are a strength. Good confidence from the rookie #NEREVS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) header from the left side of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Steve Neumann with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: BENJADED #NEREVS FAN
timelineItems.text: Somebody GIF José psyching out his marker. I love it. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: I like that move there by Jose. Get inside the keepers head. Keep him on his toes #Awesome #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: BENJADED #NEREVS FAN
timelineItems.text: Not that they aren't earned but Davies has certainly been getting the calls tonight. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: B. Schimmel
timelineItems.text: Need another goal here. Not comfortable with a one goal lead...#NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Daigo Kobayashi tries a through ball, but José Gonçalves is caught offside.
